40 namespace Mutation {
41  namespace Transport {
42 
48 template <template <typename, int> class Solver>
49 class ViscosityChapmannEnskog : public ViscosityAlgorithm
50 {
51 public:
52  ViscosityChapmannEnskog(ViscosityAlgorithm::ARGS collisions) :
53  ViscosityAlgorithm(collisions),
54  m_sys(MatrixXd::Zero(collisions.nHeavy(), collisions.nHeavy())),
55  m_x(collisions.nHeavy()),
56  m_alpha(collisions.nHeavy())
57  { }
58 
59  double viscosity()
60  {
61  const int ns = m_collisions.nSpecies();
62  const int nh = m_collisions.nHeavy();
63 
64  const ArrayXd& mi = m_collisions.mass();
65  const ArrayXd& Ast = m_collisions.Astij();
66  const ArrayXd& nDij = m_collisions.nDij();
67  const ArrayXd& etai = m_collisions.etai();
68 
69  // Form the symmetric positive definite system matrix
70  int k = ns-nh, ik, jk;
71  double fac;
72 
73  m_x = Map<const ArrayXd>(m_collisions.thermo().X()+k,nh).max(1.0e-16);
74  m_sys.diagonal().array() = m_x * m_x / etai;
75 
76  for (int j = 0, index = 1; j < nh; ++j, ++index) {
77  jk = j+k;
78  for (int i = j+1; i < nh; ++i, ++index) {
79  ik = i+k;
80  fac = m_x(i)*m_x(j) / (nDij(index) * (mi(ik) + mi(jk)));
81  m_sys(i,j) = fac * (1.2 * Ast(index) - 2.0);
82  m_sys(i,i) += fac * (1.2 * mi(jk) / mi(ik) * Ast(index) + 2.0);
83  m_sys(j,j) += fac * (1.2 * mi(ik) / mi(jk) * Ast(index) + 2.0);
84  }
85  }
86 
87  // Solve the linear system
88  m_solver.compute(m_sys);
89  m_alpha = m_solver.solve(m_x.matrix());
90 
91  // Finally compute the dot product of alpha and X
92  return m_x.matrix().dot(m_alpha);
93  }
94 
95 private:
96 
97  MatrixXd m_sys;
98  ArrayXd m_x;
99  VectorXd m_alpha;
100  Solver<MatrixXd, Lower> m_solver;
101 };
102 
103 // Register the Chapmann-Enskog solution using the LDLT decomposition
104 Config::ObjectProvider<
105  ViscosityChapmannEnskog<LDLT>, ViscosityAlgorithm>
106  visc_CE_LDLT("Chapmann-Enskog_LDLT");
107 
108 // Register the Chapmann-Enskog solution using the Conjugate-Gradient algorithm.
109 // Note the use of a proxy class CG to reduce the template arguments to 2
110 template <typename MatrixType, int UpLo>
111 class CG : public ConjugateGradient<MatrixType, UpLo> { };
112 Config::ObjectProvider<
113  ViscosityChapmannEnskog<CG>, ViscosityAlgorithm>
114  visc_CE_CG("Chapmann-Enskog_CG");
115
